instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-2936 backlight problem
threads.message:
liquid damage, cleaned and everything looks relatively good except no backlight (image on screen) and probably thunderbolt caps may be shot

PPVOUT_SW_LCDBKLT only 12.6V too low

BKLT_EN 3.2V ok

LCD_BKLT_PWM 0V bad

SMC_LID_R 3.4 ok




replaced U9701

now LCD_BKLT_PWM 3V
but still no backlight

what next?

threads.title: 820-2936 backlight problem
threads.message: Corroded feedback trace(S). Usually to pin A5 and/or B1/B2. Read sticky on backlight repair too.
